The choice of the classification system of Sasser et al. (1984) and the rating chart of Bridge & Page (1980) for the resistance studies of S. linnaeanum and S. sisymbriifolium cv. Sis 6001 to M. chitwoodi was because they can be applied to any crop and they also allow results from different studies to be compared without the need to include the susceptible controls
